name: Balance (itch) (skotapati)
description:
In this new twist on classic physics games, you can tilt your phone to balance building blocks. Build a structure out of different shapes, and make sure that none fall off of the platform. 10 new levels every month!

How to Play
  • Press A to move the block to the left, press D to move the block to the right
  • Press S to drop the block
  • Press W to pause
  • Use the left and right arrow keys to tilt the platform
